_sText:
STORY:
Inspired by the recent hostage situation downtown up a building, a group of bandits hijack their own building, taking 2 hostages along with them. CT's quickly hear of this, tanks are everywhere. Time to raid the building.

Features this map has:
Breakable Glass
32 v 32
Decent Bot Support
Heights to Die From
Rain
Balconies :)

Development Time
February 3rd - February 11th, 2024
